metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45469 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In __f2fs_setxattr in fs/f2fs/xattr.c in the Linux kernel through 5.15.11, there is an out-of-bounds memory access when an inode has an invalid last xattr entry.

criterions.comment: linux package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
